attributes.action: The Government to hold a referendum to bring back capital punishment for murder
attributes.additional_details: In the light of all the recent stabbings all over the country there is not sufficient deterrence to stop these Murders
attributes.background: To hold a Referendum to bring back Capital punishment in the uk.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign the following petitions, which call for similar action:

Abolish whole life orders and reintroduce the death penalty
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/700357

Hold a referendum on restoring the Death Penalty for murder
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/709623
